author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

A few dead assignments were spot by the static analyzer in the two plugins. Being simple, they are fixed here.

While doing so:
- Some distance calculation was also speed up in ZToMuMuGammaAnalyzer 
- I profited to merge the .h and .cc files into a single one for ZToMuMuGammaAnalyzer 


#### PR validation:

It builds

No differences are expected whatsoever
title: Remove dead assignments for ZToMuMuGammaAnalyzer and HGCalSimHitValidation
